section.title: Past Continuous and Past Simple
section.sectiontitle: Use the Past Continuous to talk about an action in progress at a time in the past. Make the Past Continuous with was/were + -ing.
section.text1a: I was living in France at that time.
section.text2a: We were travelling between May and August 2004.
section.sectiontitle2: Use the Past Simple to talk about a finished action in the past.

section.title: Past Continuous and Past Simple
section.sectiontitle: Use the Past Continuous for an action that was interrupted by another action. Use the Past Simple for the interrupting action.
section.text1a: I was sleeping when the phone rang.
section.text2a: They were playing tennis when it started raining.
